articles.title: Thisara Perera becomes first Sri Lankan to hit six sixes in an over - The Indian Express
articles.description: Thisara Perera achieved the feat during his unbeaten 13-ball 52 while captaining Sri Lanka Army in a group match against Bloomfield Cricket and Athletic Club in a domestic List A tournament.
articles.content:
All-rounder Thisara Perera became the first Sri Lankan to hit six sixes in an over in any form of professional cricket during a domestic tournament near in Colombo.
